metadata.title: CVE-2023-52647 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: nxp: imx8-isi: Check whether crossbar pad is non-NULL before accessWhen translating source to sink streams in the crossbar subdev, thedriver tries to locate the remote subdev connected to the sink pad. Theremote pad may be NULL, if userspace tries to enable a stream that endsat an unconnected crossbar sink. When that occurs, the driverdereferences the NULL pad, leading to a crash.Prevent the crash by checking if the pad is NULL before using it, andreturn an error if it is.
